TopicTitle: The "Why is this even in KSP?!?" Challenge

Articles.Content:
Build something that you would not usually expect to see in KSP.

All mods permitted.

My attempt - a shack.

[http://youtu.be/Ap1Elbd-OEs?hd=1](https://youtu.be/Ap1Elbd-OEs?hd=1)
If you could make a bigger version, like an apartment building, that would make some real good target practice!

Challenge! Put that shed into orbit! 8)

Craft file please...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NBLtLRT5PSY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Because why not?
Quick - Someone make an AT-AT!

I saw the shack and thought 'someone needs to make a flying outhouse.'

First outhouse on the Mun? Minmus?

I made a square rocket with pyramid shroud that can be ejected to reveal a small craft.

> 
> Quick - Someone make an AT-AT!

 Not my work:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cSFb8_YnPuA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> Not my work:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cSFb8_YnPuA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It\'s alive!!!!

> 
> It\'s alive!!!!

\*CRASH BOOOM!!!!!\*

Let\'s try that again.

I dug around to see if I had any pictures or vids of goofy stuff I\'d made. The only thing I found was...........SPACE LAMP

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4VGukRyjyk4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I stuck the flight chief\'s car on the roof of the VAB.

> ![kqueD.png](http://i.imgur.com/kqueD.png)
> ![N5SjG.png](http://i.imgur.com/N5SjG.png)
>

I also picked up Kerbin with the same truck.

> ![nxhAg.png](http://i.imgur.com/nxhAg.png)
> ![hGMpf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hGMpf.jpg)

Can\'t tell if this should or not be in the game, but posting anyway ;D

![HxpmD.png](http://i.imgur.com/HxpmD.png)

> 
> Can\'t tell if this should or not be in the game, but posting anyway ;D
> 
> -snip-

Domo arigato Mr. Roboto....

Increased the speed and collision resistance of the Damned Robotics cylinders.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Oq0avL-Zobg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Will have to redesign for better forward motion.

But that\'s a perfectly adequate means of transportation and, should therefore, be in game. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

May I ask what inspired that crazy, genius, contraption?

I made a barge.

> ![barge1.jpg](http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/4586/barge1.jpg)
> ![barge2.jpg](http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/795/barge2.jpg)

I guess I could try to land VTOLs on it, assuming they could survive the deadly lag zone that surrounds it.

> 
> I made a barge.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![barge1.jpg](http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/4586/barge1.jpg)
> > ![barge2.jpg](http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/795/barge2.jpg)
> 
> 
> I guess I could try to land VTOLs on it, assuming they could survive the deadly lag zone that surrounds it.

Is it actually a barge? Or is it more of an amphibious carrier?

Er well, it does roll in order to make it to the water, but just getting it off the runway without it snapping in half is rather difficult.

It\'s much less likely to break once it\'s on the water.

> 
> Er well, it does roll in order to make it to the water, but just getting it off the runway without it snapping in half is rather difficult.
> 
> It\'s much less likely to break once it\'s on the water.

May I suggest a save file with a barge or two in the water, for VTOL landing practice?

This failed pier should not be there. No surprise we called cleaning agency.

![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13199.0;attach=21482;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13199.0;attach=21482;image)

LETS SHOOT IT!

I call it the Stairway to Heaven.

> ![BarMA.png](http://i.imgur.com/BarMA.png)

> 
> I call it the Stairway to Heaven.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![BarMA.png](http://i.imgur.com/BarMA.png)

Or, The Stairway To The Ground.

Just being kerbal. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Or, The Stairway To The Ground.
> 
> Just being kerbal. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well, the bigger version did do nothing but break in half. Half of it crashed into the ground while the other half kind of floated away forever.

> 
> May I suggest a save file with a barge or two in the water, for VTOL landing practice?

> 
> LETS SHOOT IT!

Were those requests? If so, knock yourselves out. Just be warned, this thing is so big it may cause immense lag and/or melt your computer.
